titleInfo.title: Photograph of soldiers at camp in relaxed pose

physicalDescription.extent: 1 photograph : sepia photographic print ; 12.6 x 8 cm

mods.abstract: Consists of photographic postcard of many [soldiers] arranged in front of an [army] camp. The men are in relaxed poses, many are smiling, and some have placed camp mugs on top of their heads. On the back of the image is written, "Just after [VD]."
